mapper.select: select id, gender from address where id in (#{shipperAddressId},#{deliveryAddressId})

select a.id, a.firm_id as firmId, a.customer_id as customerId, a.content, a.contact_name as contactName, a.gender, a.cellphone, a.is_default as isDefault, a.city_id as cityId, a.city_name as cityName, a.create_time as createTime from address a where a.firm_id = #{firmId} and a.customer_id = #{customerId}

select a.id, a.firm_id as firmId, a.customer_id as customerId, a.content, a.contact_name as contactName, a.gender, a.cellphone, a.is_default as isDefault, a.city_id as cityId, a.city_name as cityName, a.create_time as createTime from address a where a.firm_id = #{firmId} and a.customer_id = #{customerId} and a.is_default = 1
mapper.update: update address set is_default = 0 where firm_id = #{firmId} and customer_id = #{customerId} and id != #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into address(firm_id, customer_id, content, contact_name, gender, cellphone, is_default, city_id, city_name, create_time) values (#{firmId}, #{customerId}, #{content}, #{contactName}, #{gender}, #{cellphone}, #{isDefault}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, now())
